cash.info: Very useful handy currency. Can be used to purchase items in the shop.

orb.info: Black Magic Orb - The currency for the black market.

evil_eye.info: A mystical charm believed to ward off evil

construction_site.info: Active construction site full of scaffolds

family_home.info: Cozy home for a small family

village_block.info: Several houses forming a small village block

beach_umbrella.info: Umbrella providing shade on the beach

observation_tower.info: Tall tower to observe the surroundings
